verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation_en: Woe to those who give less [than due],
verses.translation_zh: 伤哉！称量不公的人们。

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation_en: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
verses.translation_zh: 当他们从别人称量进来的时候，他们称量得很充足；

verses.translation_en: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
verses.translation_zh: 当他们量给别人或称给别人的时候，他们不称足不量足。

verses.translation_en: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
verses.translation_zh: 难道他们不信自己将复活，

verses.translation_en: For a tremendous Day -
verses.translation_zh: 在一个重大的日子吗？

verses.translation_en: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，人们将为全世界的主而起立。

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation_en: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，恶人们的纪录，将在一本恶行簿中。

verses.translation_en: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
verses.translation_zh: 你怎能知道恶行簿是什麽？

verses.translation_en: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
verses.translation_zh: 是一本封存的簿子。

verses.translation_en: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，伤哉否认的人们

verses.translation_en: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
verses.translation_zh: 否认报应日的人们！

verses.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation_en: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
verses.translation_zh: 只有每个过分的犯罪的人，否认它。

verses.text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation_en: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
verses.translation_zh: 当别人对他宣读我的迹象的时候，他说：这是古人的故事。

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلْ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation_en: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，但他们所犯的罪恶，已像锈样蒙敝他们的心。

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation_en: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
verses.translation_zh: 真的，在那日，他们必受阻拦，不得觐见他们的主。

verses.translation_en: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
verses.translation_zh: 然後，他们必堕入烈火之中。

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation_en: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
verses.translation_zh: 然後，或者将对他们说：这就是你们所否认的。

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation_en: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
verses.translation_zh: 真的，善人们的记录，确在善行簿中。

verses.translation_en: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
verses.translation_zh: 你怎能知道善行簿是什麽？

verses.translation_en: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
verses.translation_zh: 是一本封存的簿子，

verses.translation_en: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
verses.translation_zh: 真主所亲近的天神们将作证它。

verses.translation_en: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
verses.translation_zh: 善人们必在恩泽中，

verses.translation_en: On adorned couches, observing.
verses.translation_zh: 靠在床上注视著，

verses.translation_en: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
verses.translation_zh: 你能在他们的面目上认识恩泽的光华。

verses.translation_en: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
verses.translation_zh: 他们将饮封存的天醇，

verses.text: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
verses.translation_en: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
verses.translation_zh: 封瓶口的，是麝香。教贪爱这种幸福的人们，争先为善吧！

verses.translation_en: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
verses.translation_zh: 天醇的混合物，是由太斯尼姆来的，

verses.translation_en: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
verses.translation_zh: 那是一洞泉水，真主所亲近的人将饮它。

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation_en: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
verses.translation_zh: 犯罪的人们常常嘲笑信士们，

verses.translation_en: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
verses.translation_zh: 当信士们从他们的面前走过的时候，他们以目互相示意；

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation_en: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
verses.translation_zh: 当他们回家的时候，洋洋得意地回去；

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.translation_en: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
verses.translation_zh: 当他们遇见信士们的时候，他们说：这等人确是迷误的。

verses.translation_en: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
verses.translation_zh: 他们没有被派去监视信士们。

verses.text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation_en: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
verses.translation_zh: 故今日信士们，嘲笑不信道的人们，

verses.translation_en: On adorned couches, observing.
verses.translation_zh: 他们靠在床上注视著，

verses.text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation_en: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
verses.translation_zh: 不信道的人们已获得他们的行为的报酬了吗？
